goals__remit:
Mission 
The mission of EAVI is to serve the public interest in the fields of media. 
 
Objectives 
Therefore the EAVI primary objective is to promote and enhance the interests of citizens and media users across Europe. 
 
EAVI works on media literacy, full citizenship and education.
relevant_communication:
We organised a public debate at the European parliament on 5 December 2017 on Democracy, Journalism and Literacy – How to preserve media freedom, pluralism and citizens’ interests in a post-truth era.
